name: Kenneth Mackenzie

reviews.text: Good location , less than 10 mins walk from Royal Mile. Rooms basic but comfortable , friendly staff. Breakfast was great - you can have a continental and a fried breakfast if you want. Which is nice...
reviews.title: Great value for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was clean and tidy. The ensuite is a bit on the small side ,more of a wet room but no problems. Bed was cumfy,with clean sheets and pillows. Wardrobe for your clothes and chest of drawers ,plenty of space .Price At £60.00 for a Double room/night (not per person) includes a great breakfast of continental buffet and a cooked breakfast that will set you up for the day.
reviews.title: Great place

likes.disliked: — On the fourth floor with no lift.

reviews.text: The staff are very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Best budget hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Restricted parking in the street but free parking a 10 minute walk away at the University car park.
reviews.title: good value and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: No lifts in the building and you could be on the 4th floor.
reviews.title: Not too bad but know what you're getting

description: Our bed and breakfast accommodation at Richmond Place is close to all of Edinburgh's main tourist attractions, including the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle, so you will find it easy to see the sights during your stay. All 20 double and 20 single rooms have en-suite facilities, TV, Telephone, chargeable internet access and tea/coffee-making facilities.
